an10.67:4.1: Ekaṃ samayaṃ bhagavā kosalesu cārikaṃ caramāno mahatā bhikkhusaṅghena saddhiṃ yena naḷakapānaṃ nāma kosalānaṃ nigamo tadavasari.
an10.67:4.2: Tatra sudaṃ bhagavā naḷakapāne viharati palāsavane.
an10.67:4.3: Tena kho pana samayena bhagavā tadahuposathe bhikkhusaṅghaparivuto nisinno hoti.
an10.67:4.4: Atha kho bhagavā bahudeva rattiṃ bhikkhūnaṃ dhammiyā kathāya sandassetvā samādapetvā samuttejetvā sampahaṃsetvā tuṇhībhūtaṃ tuṇhībhūtaṃ bhikkhusaṅghaṃ anuviloketvā āyasmantaṃ sāriputtaṃ āmantesi:
an10.67:5.1: “Vigatathinamiddho kho, sāriputta, bhikkhusaṃgho.
an10.67:5.2: Paṭibhātu taṃ, sāriputta, bhikkhūnaṃ dhammī kathā.
an10.67:5.5: “Evaṃ, bhante”ti kho āyasmā sāriputto bhagavato paccassosi.
an10.67:6.1: Atha kho bhagavā catugguṇaṃ saṅghāṭiṃ paññāpetvā dakkhiṇena passena sīhaseyyaṃ kappesi pāde pādaṃ accādhāya sato sampajāno uṭṭhānasaññaṃ manasi karitvā.
an10.67:6.2: Tatra kho āyasmā sāriputto bhikkhū āmantesi:
an10.67:6.4: “Āvuso”ti kho te bhikkhū āyasmato sāriputtassa paccassosuṃ.
an10.67:7.1: “Yassa kassaci, āvuso, saddhā natthi kusalesu dhammesu, hirī natthi …
an10.67:7.3: vīriyaṃ natthi …
an10.67:7.4: paññā natthi kusalesu dhammesu, tassa yā ratti vā divaso vā āgacchati, hāniyeva pāṭikaṅkhā kusalesu dhammesu no vuddhi.
an10.67:7.5: Seyyathāpi, āvuso, kāḷapakkhe candassa yā ratti vā divaso vā āgacchati, hāyateva vaṇṇena hāyati maṇḍalena hāyati ābhāya hāyati ārohapariṇāhena;
an10.67:7.6: evamevaṃ kho, āvuso, yassa kassaci saddhā natthi kusalesu dhammesu, hirī natthi …
an10.67:7.9: paññā natthi kusalesu dhammesu, tassa yā ratti vā divaso vā āgacchati, hāniyeva pāṭikaṅkhā kusalesu dhammesu no vuddhi.
an10.67:9.1: Yassa kassaci, āvuso, saddhā atthi kusalesu dhammesu, hirī atthi …
an10.67:9.3: paññā atthi kusalesu dhammesu, tassa yā ratti vā divaso vā āgacchati, vuddhiyeva pāṭikaṅkhā kusalesu dhammesu no parihāni.
an10.67:9.4: Seyyathāpi, āvuso, juṇhapakkhe candassa yā ratti vā divaso vā āgacchati, vaḍḍhateva vaṇṇena vaḍḍhati maṇḍalena vaḍḍhati ābhāya vaḍḍhati ārohapariṇāhena;
an10.67:9.5: evamevaṃ kho, āvuso, yassa kassaci saddhā atthi kusalesu dhammesu, hirī atthi …
